response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its exceptional features and benefits, we believe its true value lies well beyond $12,000. Considering the unique value it would bring to your business or personal endeavors, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $15,000. This is an exceptional deal, considering the market value and the unparalleled experience it promises. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your life.", "product_price": 15000}
